message: With Nokia and Microsoft being partners now, I wonder if the PySide team is going to get the axe. I sure hope not...
Well, my question was answered. http://lists.openbossa.org/pipermail/pyside/2011-February/002099.html . No one here seems to care, though, hehe.
@ARussell , thanks for the info about pyside.
A hearty thanks from me as well. I have been concerned, I prefer PySide over PyQT, but have been to busy to search. Thanks again.

You're welcome. =) I'm looking forward to the 1.0 release; they actually have a release candidate out now. http://www.pyside.org/2011/02/python-for-qt-version-1-0-0-release-candidate-1-the-name-doesnt-matter-released/
Glad to hear about PySide not getting axed. I just started using it and would hate to switch to something else now.
